title: Ram ni eng tak chu a awm a
lyrics:
Ram ni eng tak chu a awm a,
Vanram eng takah chuan;
Ram ni tla ngai tawh lova kha,
Chhandamtu eng a ni.

Isua kraws kan put chuanin,
Lallukhum kan chang ang;
Chumi ram kan thlen hunin,
Chatuanin kan eng reng ang.

Chu ramah chuan muanna a awm,
Thihna lui piahah chuan;
Hlauhawm zawng zwang kiannaah chuan,
Tah chuan kan ro a awm.

In a awm, in ropui tak chu,
Van Lalpa awmna chu;
Heta kan hmangaih fote khan,
Khitah min lo lawm ang.

He khawvel buaina hlauhawm hi,
Rang taka pelh ka duh;
Khitah mi thianghlimte pawlin,
Thihna a awm tawh lo vang
